ca.odell.glazedlists
Interface CollectionList.Model<E,S>

Enclosing class:
CollectionList<S,E>
public static interface CollectionList.Model<E,S>

Provides the logic to map a parent object (e.g. an album) to its children (e.g. the songs on the album). Serves basically the same purpose as TreeModel does to a JTree in Swing.

See Also:
CollectionList, GlazedLists.listCollectionListModel()

Method Summary
 List<S> getChildren(E parent)
          Return a list of the child nodes for a parent node.
 

Method Detail

getChildren

List<S> getChildren(E parent)
Return a list of the child nodes for a parent node.

Parameters:
parent - the parent node.
Returns:
a List containing the child nodes.
